Judul: ADJUSTING READING LIGHTS STP AND MARKETING MIX TO THE TARGET MARKET
Abstrak: The purpose of this research is to assist in adjusting the elements of Light Reading marketing with their target market. In determining it, researchers conducted a literature study, observation, surveys, interviews, and FGD. The first thing to do is know the vision of this store to see whether Reading Lights target market has fit both from the viewpoint of the owner and manager. Then, look for the fact on field by conducting field surveys on Reading Lights customers. After that, to find what Reading Lights should provide towards the target market in accordance with the marketing concept will be done by interviews with customers who are the target market and FGD with various parties to obtain a wide view and comprehensive.
Kata Kunci: Reading Lights, marketing mix, service marketing, marketing strategy, change in marketing.
